command.name: -bet
command.description: Bet on an option in a currently running karma kasino.

command.name: -karma
command.description: Returns your or a given users post and link karma.

command.name: -wiretransfer
command.description: Used to send karma to a user.

command.name: -trousch
command.description: Dare a user to do something, and send them karma if they actually do!

command.name: -ehned
command.description: Put karma on a dare, that will be distributed if the dare is fulfilled.

command.name: -endtrousch
command.description: Used to conclude a dare you've opened, if the dare was fulfilled or not.

command.name: -myfav
command.description: Save your favorite games, movies, shows, anime, books, music, mix or pokemon as a collage, or check out other peoples collages.

command.name: -collage
command.description: Automatically crops 9 given links and creates a nice 3x3 collage for you.

command.name: -drumpf
command.description: Prints a tweet with your text from the United States presidents' Twitter account.

command.name: -meme
command.description: With a given image url and top and bottom string, returns an impact font meme.

command.name: -suggest
command.description: Used to give suggestions for new features/improvements to the bot developer

command.name: -source
command.description: Returns basic information about the bot.

command.name: -ping
command.description: Returns the current latency of the bot.

command.name: -help
command.description: Returns this list of commands.

command.name: -postlb
command.description: Returns the top voted messages of all time and this week.

command.name: -reload
command.description: Reloads all cogs.

command.name: -restart
command.description: Restarts vital bot processes.

command.name: -checkpost
command.description: Checks a given message_id in a given channel_id. Updates top post archive.

command.name: -openkasino
command.description: Opens a new instance of the karma kasino.

command.name: -lockkasino
command.description: Locks current karma kasino so that no new bets can be made.

command.name: -closekasino
command.description: Closes the running instance of the karma kasino.

command.name: -refreshkasino
command.description: Replaces old karma kasino message with a new message.
